speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I would like to advise that the oversight hearing scheduled before the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources to receive testimony regarding Reform of the Mining Law of 1872, on Thursday, December 13, 2007, at 9:30 a.m., has been postponed. A rescheduled date and time will be announced when it becomes available.
For further information, please contact Patty Beneke at (202) 224-5451, Angela Becker-Dippman at (202) 224-5269 or Gina Weinstock at (202) 224-5684.
